# sse_ips_profile (Data Source)

Fetches a single IPS Profile by name.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sse_ips_profile" "example" {
  name = "Standard IPS Profile"
}

output "ips_profile_id" {
  value = data.sse_ips_profile.example.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the IPS profile to find.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) The ID of this resource.
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `system_mode` (String)
